abstract: Sani Haruna Kaita (born 2 May 1986 in Kano, Nigeria) is a Nigerian footballer playing for Nigeria Premier League team Enyimba F.C.
comment: Sani Haruna Kaita (born 2 May 1986 in Kano, Nigeria) is a Nigerian footballer playing for Nigeria Premier League team Enyimba F.C.
